ValidationRule.description: When Template Strategy is 'Concatenate Templates' and IsActive is true, the TemplateContentVersionId field must be blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( IsActive__c = true, ISPICKVAL(Template_Strategy__c, "Concatenate Templates"), NOT(ISBLANK(TemplateContentVersionId__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Template ContentVersion ID must be blank when strategy is 'Concatenate Templates'.
